resources.string: Hi, my name is Abdul Aziz. I am a software developer with strong interests in AI and machine learning as well as building high quality software applications. I have strong programming skills in Java, Python and Javascript. I also have strong analytical, creative and problem-solving skills and aim to become a world class expert in Software Engineering.
